thoughts: Wonders if they would have gotten the chance to do r_c's first check-up
Can still smell the bitter herbs that they desperately fetched to try and save r_c's life
Thought they heard r_c's mewls, but was wrong
Contemplates how short r_c's life was and how much they are missing
Is questioning if r_c would grow up in StarClan or stay a newborn
Prays that r_c is healthy and receives the strength they need to grow in StarClan
Is finally accepting they did all they could to save r_c
Is pondering which role r_c would have been
Ponders how StarClan would deal with r_c
Thought they encountered r_c while scavenging for herbs, but it was a trick of their mind
Is listening to the reason behind r_c's name with a fond smile
Wonders if newborn kits grow up to be adults or stay young forever in StarClan
Is asking StarClan why they take newborns to Silverpelt
Prays that all the newborn kits in StarClan get enough food to stay strong
Is contemplating StarClan and why they would allow newborns to pass
Is reflecting on r_c's pelt, and is sad they never knew their eye color
Was startled to meet a newborn kit while dreaming and ponders what it meant
Was spooked when they encountered a ghostly newborn while collecting herbs, which disappeared when noticed
Is asking their mentor why StarClan allows newborns to join Silverpelt
Is vowing to never let another newborn join StarClan's ranks
Is wondering if r_c was a part of the stars last night
Thought they heard r_c's mewls, but it was just the wind
Is questioning who would provide for r_c in StarClan
Wonders if r_c would have played with the insects in the grass if they had time to grow up
Questions if r_c's spirit exists in the tall grasses
Thought they saw r_c's spirit hanging around the nursery tunnel
Wonders if r_c gets to venture out of the tunnels in StarClan
Thought they saw r_c playing with the roots of the tree, but sadly shakes off the thought
Was surprised to find r_c's spot in the nursery warm, despite them being with the stars now
Is pondering if r_c would stay in tunnels or go out an explore the territory in StarClan
Wonders if the newborns in StarClan will ever get to play and run across open fields
Prays to StarClan that the passed newborn kits get to feel the wind across their pelt
Is wondering if r_c would have been their friend
Wonders if they would have swapped secrets with r_c
Is wondering if they are good enough to become a medicine cat
Helps apply a poultice to a small wound
Is enjoying learning all of the herbs a medicine cat needs!
Is wondering if r_c would have bothered them while they were sorting herbs
Wonders if they would have had to treat r_c for kittencough
Wonders if r_c would have been a better healer
Wishes the other apprentices could understand how they feel
Wishes they understood the apprentice's inside jokes
Was asked to gather fresh moss for the elders' bedding
Plans to visit the elders soon
Is checking in on the elder's den
Plans to help the elders with their ticks
Is helping to repair the elder's den
Wants to help r_c gather fresh herbs
Is wondering if they are a good enough medicine cat apprentice
Is hoping their medicine cat name will end in -claw
